1112049991105826816.text:
What I can't do under a minute: explain to someone what zero-knowledge proofs are and how on earth they are even possible

What I *can* do under a minute: send them a fully shielded Zcash transaction from my phone, backed by a Raspberry Pi full-node!pic.twitter.com/hpsGQZgiv2

1110260453626675200.text: Reminder: Zcash meetup in San Francisco tomorrow (Tuesday, March 26) from 6-8pm. RSVP via Meetup:https://www.meetup.com/Bay-Area-Zcash-Users/events/259399671/ …

1114552784093949955.text: I reported a bug late last night to @ZecWallet. Within 12 hours, the developer had reproduced it, patched it, and released a new version.  #ZcashZealhttps://twitter.com/zecwallet/status/1114536521921466374 …

1118830504847998977.text: "SHH!" $ZEC Shielded Zcash now in retail stores -- faster than credit cards, more private than cash @ZcashFoundation @zecwallethttps://youtu.be/fGRBcstWMYU

1123224065861275650.text: Zcash Shielded Transactions on the Raspberry Pi https://garethtdavies.com/crypto/zcash-shielded-transactions-on-the-raspberry-pi.html … #Zcash

1108793855695114241.text: The new @zecwallet is too easy to use to not to use it. Get on it!

1099025819802918912.text:
v0.1 of the Zcash Android wallet is now publicly available on the Google Play Store. Download ZecQT Wallet, connect to your desktop zec-qt-wallet node, and start sending and receiving private, shielded transactions on your mobile phone!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adityapk.zcash.zqwandroid …
#zcash #ZECpic.twitter.com/17iYUBP1k6

1111326330027569153.text:
A bugfix release of ZecWallet Android companion app is out! Fixes issues with the URIs and better handles localization. 

Update from the Google play store or download:https://github.com/adityapk00/zqwandroid/releases …

1110321399187464192.text:
ZecWallet now has Payment Requests!

Request ZEC from a Sapling address by sending them an encrypted Payment Request using ZecWallet. Both the request and the payment are completely private. 

Download: https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …
#ZEC #Zcashpic.twitter.com/4Lo1KpC2Nj

1113124671027683333.text:
ZecWallet wormhole will be down for scheduled maintenance for 10 mins tonight at 9pm PT, to upgrade to a larger machine. 

This only affects ZecWallet android users connecting over wormhole. Desktop users are not affected.

1111756918656135168.text:
A new maintainance release of ZecWallet is out!
- Update zcashd to 2.0.4
- Remove Sprout receiving support

Download:https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …

1108468355181142016.text:
New release of ZecWallet v0.6.3 adds new troubleshooting options for common wallet problems! It also registers for the "zcash:" payment URIs, so you can open payment URIs directly in ZecWallet.

Download: https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …
#Zcash #ZECpic.twitter.com/IalmqxDbr1

1110955400579313664.text: ZecWallet will remove support for receiving Sprout funds in a release later this week. If you have any funds in Sprout addresses, you'll still be able to send outgoing transactions and use the turnstile migration tool as usual.https://twitter.com/zecwallet/status/1090701089777672192 …

1116831097923358720.text: A new version of the ZecWallet Android app is out that fixes some bugs. You can update from the play store or download the APK here.https://github.com/adityapk00/zqwandroid/releases …

1114207022306586624.text:
A new bugfix release of ZecWallet is out (v0.6.6)

Download: https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …

* Fix an issue where the direct connection from Android to desktop wouldn't work
* Fix the autoupdate notification
* Fix signature verification instructions

1114536521921466374.text: A new bugfix release of ZecWallet (v0.6.7) is out for people that were having trouble connecting the Android companion app. If you use the Android app, please upgrade to the new desktop version:https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases/ …

1108423840223256576.text: ZecWallet users should suspend trust in incoming Sprout funds until they've upgraded to v2.0.4. See this security announcement: https://z.cash/support/security/announcements/security-announcement-2019-03-19/ …https://twitter.com/JEhrenhofer/status/1108360774731350016 …

1119389145971879936.text: A new maintenance release of ZecWallet is out that fixes some URI issues for merchant payments. Also includes some stability fixes.https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …

1110274306393567232.text:
ZecWallet now lets you request payment (in ZEC) from your friends and family using shielded invoices!

Select "File -> Request zcash"  to get started!

Download: https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zecwallet/releases …pic.twitter.com/xIK2n9908L

1110955844500221952.text:
If you've given out your Sprout addresses and people are sending funds to that address, the funds will still show up on your ZecWallet as usual, but you should switch to Sapling addresses at this time. 

Of course, the underlying zcashd still supports Sprout send/receive.
